content: An influential figure in the tech industry, this entrepreneur is known for his work with Amazon and Blue Origin. He's a billionaire with a name that starts with "Jeff". Who is he?

I believe you're referring to Jeff Bezos. He is indeed a prominent figure in the tech industry, being the founder of Amazon, one of the world's largest e-commerce companies, and Blue Origin, a spaceflight services company. Bezos has been ranked as one of the wealthiest people in the world for many years due to his holdings in Amazon and other investments. His leadership and innovations have significantly impacted global commerce and space exploration.
